name: Clash of Stars
description:
Clash of Stars is a strategy sci-fi star game with rich gameplay and events.
You, a commander, begin your own galactic journey in the depth of the universe and grow from a small space station.

Something dangerous is lurking in the deep space and looking for a chance. Who will be next target, the devious predators, the ambitious rogue or the homeless nomad?

In this universe, there are no permanent friends and no permanent enemies.

The door to Clash of Stars is open now. Come on, commander, join us and see what lie ahead in the uncharted galaxy!

Please remember our unique game features before you venture into our galaxy.

★Newbie Support:
You will see this big universe from a small initial star zone, where you meet challenges and get many supports. And you will see a bigger world and rich gameplay when you are out of this beginning zone.

★Different types of spaceships:
There are many spaceships for you to pilot. Destroyer, cruiser, battleship, aircraft carrier and special ship. Each type has its unique skills. You need to set core modules, adjust formation and allocate hero to make your space fleet more powerful. And that’s the key to win in a battle. There is no best spaceship in clash of stars, but there is the most suitable strategy.

★Fun and creative events and gameplay:
There are a variety of events for the aggressive players from all around the world. Skirmish, legion war, territory war, arena competition, wormhole attack, stronghold war, cross-server legion war. In our game, you can explore the world by yourself in a corner of the galaxy or team with allies to join massive real time space wars.

★Start from scratch:
Play alone or work with allies to fight your own way to conquer the universe. You have a small space station at the beginning. You are free to trade, kill space pirates, collect resources, occupy a planet and finally build your space empire.

★Real-time Battlefield:
In this dynamic universe, all the battles are real time and need your control. Come defeat your enemies with your spaceships and tactics.
